name: isometris (szunami)
description:
isometris is a tetris variant that takes place on an isometric grid

left/right or a/d can be used to move pieces horizontally

up /w can be used to rotate pieces 120º

down/d can be used to move a piece down one unit

Like this? Check out Glass Canon here !

Audio is from https://noahkuehne.itch.io/free-menu-sound-pack-ui-sounds-v2

Logo font is from https://www.fontget.com/font/3d-isometric/

Palette is from https://lospec.com/palette-list/apollo
